format: A data frame with 36 observations and 5 variables.

parameters.education:
factor indicating highest level of education
(elementary, secondary, high).
parameters.memory:
factor indicating whether the person had memories of
corporal punishment as a child (yes, no).
parameters.age: factor indicating age group in years (15-24, 25-39, 40-).
parameters.attitude:
factor indicating attitude: (no, moderate)
punishment of children.

reference: Anderson (1991) erroneously indicates the total sum of respondents to be 783.
title: Corporal Punishment Data
description:
Description
Data from a study of the Gallup Institute in Denmark in 1979 about the
attitude of a random sample of 1,456 persons towards corporal punishment
of children.
